summary: Removes several lines of dialog from Sigurd, the assistant of Belethor, the guy who owns the general store in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml: If you\'re like me, you\'ll be visiting Whiterun all the time to dump loot, craft, etc. And you\'ll see Belethor\'s assistant Sigurd wandering around a lot. Sigurd is very, very eager to tell you who he works for every time you see him. I\'ve removed a few of his dialog lines for a more pleasant gaming experience.
author: The Exploder
